welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Colomba, Guatemala! This charming city is known for its vibrant culture, delicious cuisine, and stunning natural landscapes. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Colomba has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Coatepeque Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Coatepeque Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights within Guatemala.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights to and from Guatemala.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Quetzaltenango Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Quetzaltenango Airport is used for shipping and receiving of goods.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.
